title: Ask Crystal: How do I stick with a budget if I have inconsistent income?
description: Every Thursday in 2025, I’ll be answering a question on money and/or budgeting. If you have a question you’d love for me to answer in an upcoming post, please submit it here. Today’s question is about how to budget when you have a variable income: “I work as a para at a school so my incomeRead More
author: Crystal Paine
